sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Formik } from 'formik';
import * as Yup from 'yup';
import Header from '../../components/Header';
import InputMask from '../../components/InputMask';
import InputRadio from '../../components/InputRadio';
import InputText from '../../components/InputText';
import {
  Container,
  Main,
  Title,
  Description,
  TextInformationContainer,
  FormContainer,
  FormLine,
  MandatoryLanguageContainer,
  InputTitle,
  InputServiceDescription,
  ServiceDescription,
  LabelTitle,
  RadioContainer,
  UrgentServiceContainer,
  ButtonText,
  RequestButton,
} from './styles';

const RequestService: React.FC = () => {
  const FormSchema = Yup.object().shape({
    name: Yup.string().required(''),
    // email
    phone: Yup.string().min(12, '').required(''),
    country: Yup.string().required(''),
    city: Yup.string().required(''),
    postalCode: Yup.string().required(''),
    Address: Yup.string().required(''),
    language: Yup.string().required(''),
    mandatoryLanguage: Yup.boolean(),
    serviceDescription: Yup.string(),
    urgentService: Yup.boolean(),
    contactPlatform: Yup.boolean(),
  });
  return (
    <>
      <Header minimalist />
      <Container>
        <Main>
          <TextInformationContainer>
            <Title>Needing a Day Laborer?</Title>
            <Description>
              We have thousands of professionals available for your needs, after
              a few moments they will contact you so you can choose the best
              one.
            </Description>
            <Description>
              To help our professional filtering please write a brief
              description about the service.
            </Description>
          </TextInformationContainer>

          <FormContainer>
            <Formik
              initialValues={{
                name: '',
                // email
                phone: '',
                country: '',
                city: '',
                postalCode: '',
                Address: '',
                language: '',
                mandatoryLanguage: null,
                serviceDescription: '',
                urgentService: null,
                contactPlatform: null,
              }}
              validationSchema={FormSchema}
              onSubmit={() => console.log('form submit')}
            >
              {({ values, handleChange }) => (
                <>
                  <FormLine>
                    <InputText
                      title="Name"
                      placeholder="Name"
                      width={0.6}
                      onChange={handleChange('name')}
                    />
                    <InputMask
                      title="Phone"
                      mask="+999 999 999 999"
                      placeholder="Phone"
                      width={0.3}
                    />
                  </FormLine>
                  <FormLine>
                    <InputText
                      title="Country"
                      placeholder="Country"
                      width={0.28}
                    />
                    <InputText title="City" placeholder="City" width={0.28} />
                    <InputText
                      title="Postal code"
                      placeholder="Postal code"
                      width={0.28}
                    />
                  </FormLine>
                  <FormLine>
                    <InputText
                      title="Address "
                      placeholder="Address "
                      width={0.4}
                    />
                    <InputText
                      title="Language"
                      placeholder="Language"
                      width={0.3}
                    />
                    <MandatoryLanguageContainer>
                      <InputTitle>Mandatory Language</InputTitle>
                      <InputRadio />
                    </MandatoryLanguageContainer>
                  </FormLine>
                  <FormLine>
                    <ServiceDescription>
                      <InputTitle>Service Description</InputTitle>
                      <InputServiceDescription placeholder="Describe what you need..." />
                    </ServiceDescription>
                  </FormLine>
                  <FormLine>
                    <UrgentServiceContainer>
                      <LabelTitle>Is a urgent service ?</LabelTitle>
                      <RadioContainer>
                        <InputRadio labelText="Yes" />
                        <InputRadio labelText="No" />
                      </RadioContainer>
                    </UrgentServiceContainer>
                  </FormLine>
                  <FormLine>
                    <LabelTitle>
                      Lugar a ser contactado ( whatsapp, messeger, telegram )
                    </LabelTitle>
                  </FormLine>
                  <RequestButton>
                    <ButtonText>Request your quotes</ButtonText>
                  </RequestButton>
                </>
              )}
            </Formik>
          </FormContainer>
        </Main>
      </Container>
    </>
  );
};

export default RequestService;
